Package cosc202.andie

Class Toolbar

java.lang.Object
cosc202.andie.Toolbar
public class Toolbar extends Object
A class to create and output a toolbar, with functions like open, save, export, undo, redo. The toolbar makes frequent uses methods easier and quicker to access. The icons used come from the links below. Open folder icons created by kumakamu - Flaticon Undo icons created by Freepik - Flaticon Curved arrow icons created by Freepik - Flaticon Export icons created by Andrean Prabowo - Flaticon Save icons created by srip - Flaticon Zoom in icons created by Freepik - Flaticon Zoom out icons created by Freepik - Flaticon Enlarge icons created by Freepik - Flaticon Rotate icons created by Karacis - Flaticon User interface icons created by Karacis - Flaticon Opposite icons created by Freepik - Flaticon Opposite icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

    Toolbar.Listener
    An action listener class to call the action methods when toolbar buttons are pressed.
